      • shuffle

        public static <L,T> UTGraph<L,T> shuffle(UTGraph<L,T> graph)
        Returns a graph with the same structure and labels as that in the argument, but with the nodes in a different order. Ie. this method returns a random isomorphism of the argument.

        Returns:

        public static <L> UGraph<L> toSimpleUGraph(Graph<L> data)
        Converts the input to a simple u graph. Any self-loops and dual links are removed. If the original graph is directed, this information is also removed.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:

      • allIso

        public static java.util.List<UGraph<java.lang.String>> allIso(int n,
                                              java.lang.String label)
        Returns all graphs, of the given size, up to isomorphism: for each isomorphism class, only the canonical example is included. Note generated on the fly, and n larger than 6 is not recommended.
        Parameters:
        n -
        label -
        Returns:

      • allIsoConnected

        public static java.util.List<UGraph<java.lang.String>> allIsoConnected(int n,
                                                       java.lang.String label)
        Returns connected graphs, of the given size, up to isomorphism: for each isomorphism class, only the canonical example is included. Note generated on the fly, and n larger than 6 is not recommended.

        n -
        label -
        Returns:
